website_summaries.verdict: Reasonably priced, durably made, and designed to keep your feet drier and warmer, these vivid diving socks from BPS are well-worth your consideration.
pros: Available in multiple sizes, extra-small to 4XL
Adjustable strap minimizes water entering socks
Glued and stitched for premium longevity
Available in a wide range of colors
cons: A handful of size and color combos may be difficult to find online

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made and will not last
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use as fin socks and nothing more. The only walking I really did in them was across sand at the beach or from my car to my garage.. That limited use didn't stop these things from quickly loosing the bottom sole. With in 2 months I had quarter dollar sized holes in both heels and balls of feet. The ankle securing system was good however. I really really liked the feel of the booties and appreciated the securing mechanism. I just wish the soles would have held up better.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Get them small if you care about speed
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted, except that I should have gotten a smaller size. They protect my feet against razor clams and other beach detritus that can cut and scrape, they go on and off easily, and the soles are reinforced. However, I got them for open-water swim races, and they really slow me down because they fill with water. If you care about speed, get them undersized so they have to be stretched on like a wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: SandyStern

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: We always swim off of lava beaches in Hawaii and inevitably cut up our feet. Not this time!! These booties are perfect. They grip the rock, they don't balloon out in water, and they keep your tootsies warm. They also make putting on fins a snap (although we usually swam without fins). Looking forward to using these in winter on our sculling boats. Durability: we never walked long distances in them, they're not meant for that. But walking across hot sand and rock? Size: Fit as described for woman's 9 and husband's 13.
customer_reviews.author: michele boris lytle

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, though snugness keeps sand out.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for beach volleyball as my previous choices wore out extremely fast. These have a thicker sole (with some traction, unlike my previous choice), and keep out the sand well. Of course, that could be because they seem to run small and are very snug. TL:DR Thick sole, thick upper/ sweaty feet playing volleyball, but no sand.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Davis

customer_reviews.title: Handy for hot or cold weather.
customer_reviews.text: Here in Texas we can go from 33 degrees to 90 degrees in a given 24 hours. My daughter likes them. They haven't ripped, torn or anything. It's possible some people that say these fall apart just got a defective one from the start. She's been using hers when it's rainy out for Sand Volleyball or in the heat. So far they're holding up. Might order a lighter color for Summer. I'd suggest you NEVER wear them on asphalt, or outside of the sand pit. Unless you'd like them to fall apart faster.
customer_reviews.author: KOS

customer_reviews.title: Work Great With Open Back Strap Fins
customer_reviews.text: This review is for BPS Storm ‘Smart Sock’ Ultra Premiun Water Fin Sock. These fin socks are perfect as beach footies usually worn on rough sand or small rock patches at the beach. My wife and I decided to get these along with new, open back (strapped) fins to replace our full-foot, slip on fins. Theses smart socks are great and wearing them with fins (straps correctly adjusted) we can do beach entries much more easily and the socks do not let the fin slip off. Highly recommend these as a great value and a product that works as advertised. Run TRUE TO SIZE as well.
customer_reviews.author: Thorne HamstringTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: XXXXL is a great fit for a size 14 wide shoe size
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, very well made. I have a high arch 14 wide foot, these fit perfectly, comfortable on and fit inside my fins (even when dry) BPS Storm even sent care instructions! Their warranty is great, 1 full year. I just ordered another pair after opening them and trying on. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Fear no Fish

customer_reviews.title: Great for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for protecting feet when walking in and out of rough sand/shell/rocky beach to go snorkeling. Gave good grip when entering slippery limestone cave lakes. Made swim fins more comfortable to wear. I wear size 7 sandals and up to 8.5 in boots and the size small socks worked great. My husband wears 12-13 shoes and the XXXL fit him. They stretch a little when wet so you don’t want them feeling loose when dry. Velcro strap around ankle is too small/constrictive on both of us so we just didn’t use it but sock didn’t feel like it was coming off. Suggest they make strap a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: My feet are so thankful when entering the ocean!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I have pretty big feet and also some serious kankles and these fit without an issue. The beach I go to can be hit or miss with the sand being soft or just being a whole mess of sharp shells and rocks. These keep the sand and rocks and everything out and my feet protected. They are so good that your feet don't even get wet unless you open up the side of them. It definitely helps with keeping your body warmer with your feet feeling super warm. Will definitely be a loyal customer to these. Very well made and I'm not seeing much wear!
customer_reviews.author: krk2816

customer_reviews.title: Great fin socks
customer_reviews.text: These worked really well, fit was snug, velcro strap worked, and they felt great under my stiff body surfing fins. They held up fine over several days of bodyboarding and snorkeling, but I didn't walk any distances in them. The trick of using a shoe insert inside worked great, for some additional protection from getting washed onto and having to stand on a reef. Will rate durability after a few more uses.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Holmes Photo

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've only used theses for a few times but very pleased so far. Used for scuba diving as fin socks and then when walking around on the hot beach/sidewalks during breaks. Do a good job at keeping sand out from around ankles and quite comfortable to wear. Can't comment on durability - have not had long enough - but seem well manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: tec

customer_reviews.title: Works well for kayaking and cave walking
customer_reviews.text: Did a cave tour in Belize where shoes/sandals are not allowed but need more support than bare feet or sock so tried these. Worked perfectly. I specifically got them on the smaller range for my feet for more support and that was a great decision. Was able to walk comfortably on the uneven surface of the cave. Used them as well for kayaking to provide a little cushioning for my heal as well as sun protection for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jen K

customer_reviews.title: Great Booties!
customer_reviews.text: My wife & I wanted a bootie for our snorkeling adventures that didn't require buying a larger size fin. These booties fit the bill perfectly! The fit was accurate, they are not so thick as to push either of us into a larger size flipper, and they included an email with detailed use instructions. I can't say enough abut the initial service from Blair at Surf & Snow Warehouse. They sure beat the prices from my usual dive gear source and are bend over backwards helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin V Hershey

customer_reviews.title: Protecting
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one for my wife but it was too large for her so I used it which was perfect fit. I used it in my water/hiking shoes for a month almost everyday in Philippines and it worked like a charm. It also helped to stop the sand to go inside and excellent for island hopping. I suggest to have 2 pairs per person so you can wash and dry one and wear one. I will be purchasing another one soon. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: "Q"

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable and warm
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable! I will be using these on a canyoneering adventure in the near future so I will update with how they hold up then... Update: these socks worked perfectly!! I Hiked/swam through 50 degree water for several hours with them on, and they kept my feet a comfortable temperature the entire time, as well as holding up great inside my Keen hiking shoes with sand, rocks and mud through the entire hike. (Note: I never tried walking in them on their own in that environment, but they were still exposed to the elements quite a bit through the sandals) They still look brand new after some pretty intense wear. Would def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, a bit light on the sole protection
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable and fit like a glove at the size I wear. I bought them as slippers for my full foot fins for beach diving. They work great in the fins, although I haven’t taken them diving yet. My only criticism is that I thought they had an actual sole based on the photo and description, but they actually seem to have rubber nubs like house slippers. It is yet to be seen how they hold up to a coral bottom, but if the last a trip or two they will be more than worth it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Celia

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy them again, I love them.
customer_reviews.text: These booties / socks are very cool. They stay on, are thin enough to let me work my feet right into my fins and to give me grip on the boat once they come out of the fins. I'd buy them again, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn McFadden

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE! Keeps the sand out!! Heyoooo!
customer_reviews.text: Love the strap on these around the ankle. They are high enough to keep sand out and lock your feet in. I'm obsessed and have sent this link to divers who have asked me where to find good socks for diving fins! These are amazing. I use them with my leader fins to prevent blisters and go up a size since my fins are too big. I also bought some $15 ones from a different seller and it's night and day. Don't do any more research I promise you'll love these. True to size!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel truax

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 pair for the whole family vacation to Florida. There was a quality issue with one pair and they gave me a no hassle refund and I reordered them. We have been using them for 3 days now on a beach covered with sharp broken shells and they are awesome. They protect against the sharp shells and hot sand and don’t slip loose when stomping through ocean waves or swimming. They are easy to get on and off and we all wonder why every hotel beach shop isn’t selling them.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one day on the beach and pool
customer_reviews.text: I have a foot injury that required a surgery and I have super tender foot skin and no fat on my right foot bottom. These were supposed to be my savings grace. They lasted one day before ripping to shreds right where I needed the protection. First few minutes they were incredibly comfortable. Had these lasted a full week on vacation I would've given em 5 stars for the price. Spend more, maybe they'll last two days.
customer_reviews.author: J. Frieders

customer_reviews.title: Great for Paddleboarding
customer_reviews.text: I live in Northern Michigan. I tried the BPS Storm Socks for out for the first time last night (Oct 31). I took the paddle board out on the lake for the first snow storm of the year. It was about 30 degrees and blizzard like conditions. My feet felt great and barely got cold (only 1 or 2 toes starting to get cold at the end of the 45 minute paddle). Really impressed with these things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A week in the seas and on the beach. Yes buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really put these thru a lot. Every day on the beach. Rocky beaches and soft beaches. Swam in them, waded in them, searched for shells, water sports and couldn’t be happier. Glad I found them. Extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hunting4gems

customer_reviews.title: Great booties!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs of these for a recent paddle boarding trip to North Carolina. They worked great, fit well, and kept our feet warm in the cool mountain waters.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Martin

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Seem nice but will need to return these. I wear a size 11.5 women's and ordered XL (11-12) and the top material at the toe and heel hang enough over the tread (underside) that the upper will tear up soon walking around at the lake in them. The gloves ran small too. So with this brand, order a size up for sure. for a size 11.5 I need XXL apparently which seems really huge.
customer_reviews.author: krkees

customer_reviews.title: ok for short term use
customer_reviews.text: Went snorkeling as part of a BSA Sea Base trip to the Florida keys and bought these. generally they did what they were supposed to do but after one day the velcro started to come off the sides, the strap, and the fabric around the velcro on the sock itself began to tear. They worked for 3-4 days of snorkeling but if you are needing something to last longer I am not so sure about these. There were other on the boat that had these the did not look like mine but I believe the difference was if you used the ankle strap as shown in the product picture or not.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Barefoot

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these socks for paddle boarding. I prefer going barefoot but with cold weather coming my feet do get to cold. My wet suit boots are to thick. These are just right. They seem well made and I'm hoping they last a couple seasons. They are very comfy and fit perfect. I wear a size 5.5 to 6 shoe and ordered the XS. My feet are a little wide.
customer_reviews.author: V. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach volleyball
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I use these socks to play beach/sand volleyball, and they work really well. They help protect your feet and make clean up easier when you’re done playing. I recommend wearing thin socks underneath to help absorb sweat, since neoprene doesn’t breathe (though my husband wears his without socks, and still likes them).
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly! I was a little worried that it might be big because of the size chart states fit from 6-7 for x-small. My shoes size is 5 to 5 1/2. But, it worked out just perfectly! It also appears to be well made. Stitching is as it should be if sewn correctly. I bought these for next year cruise vacation to Caribbean.
customer_reviews.author: A. Firman

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, comfortable, keeps sand out.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I had low expectations when I bought them, but they're really comfortable, and work great. I wore them to climb around on boulders at a very unique beach, and they saved my feet and kept the sand out of my toes. I do wish they had a more durable tread on the bottom, but other than that, they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love how these feel. So comfortable. Somehow they got a snag the first day I wore them, but I can’t complain too much for the price. Such a great deal. They were perfect for paddle boarding. Our beach is really rocky and these aren’t as stable or easy to walk quickly as some other water shoes I have but I really love them!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Saved my pedicures!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely keeps sand out and is better than other brands I tried. My only complaint is there is no breathing and your feet get really steamy. Definitely would recommend for sand and sand sports. I play sand volleyball and got tired of ruining my pedicures. These have saved me tons of money!!! I have not tried then in water yet so cant speak to that. Definitely get these!
customer_reviews.author: MaggieTee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and design.
customer_reviews.text: A very high quality product! I love the design, the features, the fabric and the customer service. They are a bit higher than typical neoprene booties and the strap keeps sand out. They are very comfortable. We have them for the entire family and will wear them in our fins and on the beach. I couldn’t be happier! If you are between sizes, I would go bigger, but I prefer looser.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy Paige

customer_reviews.title: Good for Play But...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a wetsuit, hood, gloves, and these socks. When first putting them on, one foot had 2 stitches that binded the sock— that had to be removed to put it on. The other was fine. Out of all the gear I bought, these were the weak link. When I was done swimming, these had a good amount of water inside them. At 55 degrees water temp—I’m surprised I didn’t feel it. Anyway, these will get you by with light use. If you surf, you’ll want something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great for paddle boarding
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I each got a pair for suping and they were perfect!We live in Maine and the lakes and rivers we paddle are quite chilly right now and the terrain to the water and under the water can be quite rough on the feet,these socks have the perfect amount of protection and comfort.They allowed extra grip on the boards,kept our feet warm all while still having somewhat of a barefoot experience.i feel the sizing chart was very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Glidden

customer_reviews.title: Great water socks
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for swimming and or the beach ,But after wearing these in and around the pool, the fit is great , none slipping and didn’t come off while inside water, i will keep a extra pair to wear as socks while visiting friends and family who don’t allow shoe wearing while inside home.
customer_reviews.author: LoveSelf

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit tight as your trying to put them on as you cross the heal but once over the heal they fit well and do cushion your foot within the flipper. The overall construction is however a bit weak and one of the strap seems tore after the second use. They are OK for one trip but long term durability is not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Typical Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately they fell apart after only a few uses at the beach.
customer_reviews.text: These fit me nicely and I found them to be comfortable but unfortunately I had holes in the bottom in no time and the elastic bands lost all elasticity. I almost feel bad leaving this review because I believe the company will stand behind their product but I do want to share my experience. This is the first and only pair I have ever bought so it’s possible that this is what they are all like.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 🙂
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because my brother's had stretched out my dive fins and I needed something to help fill in a couple millimeters to make my fins fit snug. My fins fit perfect now ! I love these neoprene socks❤. They are so comfortable. Definitely order these if you need to make your fins fit snugger. These will also prevent blisters. And perfect to walk on the hot hot hot sand. The sand is scorching hot during summer time here on Oahu. My feet are size 9 and I ordered the one that said 8-10.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: After years of happily snorkeling without these, we bought these as a stocking stuffer. What a difference! We were much warmer, much more comfortable in our fins, much more comfortable on the sand and ocean floor. We were surprised by how much more enjoyable it was for all four of us in our family to wear these. My daughter has a little trouble getting them on but once on she is very confortable in them.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I suppose y ou get what you pay for, but this didn't even make it through 1 summer without the velcro straps giving out. And I don't go to the beach everyday! Started to fall apart by the 3rd time I used it, already had to re-sew the velcro straps back on.
customer_reviews.author: mommysris

customer_reviews.title: 100% best purchase for our Maui trip
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome!. The fit is good and comfortable. We are currently using these on snorkel trips in Maui. The material truly keeps the fins from biting into the top of the foot/ankle... even after a couple hours of snorkeling. Oh and can't forget not having to walk barefoot on the hot sand!
customer_reviews.author: Elborgor

customer_reviews.title: High quality sock that fits great
customer_reviews.text: I have really narrow feet so I need these socks to make my fins fit without giving me blisters. I love the velcro ankle straps on these socks because I don't have to worry about them sliding around once they're wet, because these run a tiny bit wide on my foot. They are true to length and I am happy with the fit
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these already! Used for jet skiing and I was in disbelief. Water temperature was cool and after dipping my feet in I had to dip my whole leg because I didn’t feel anything (definitely did once I got past my ankles!). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: No More Grip
customer_reviews.text: Socks are comfortable and fit very well. Downside is after a couple basic wears, there is no more grip on the bottom and now they will need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Number1Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Flat seams. Great fit. Fit well in my scuba foot fins. Superb customer service and concern. First pair incorrect size put in correct bag. Seller instantly gave me a refund and followed up by email. Excellent product also.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear. I use these when wearing fins for free diving and spearfishing. They came sized as specified. This is important as some products out there run small. This is a product I will absolutely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Angila Borja

customer_reviews.title: This socks are terrible for Beach Volleyball
customer_reviews.text: This socks are terrible for playing Volleyball on a hot day. My feet where just boiling inside with the neoprene all around, meanwhile i could still feel the heat on my soles. Also some sand did get in and i got blisters. I believe this will work for water sports well, but it SHOULD NOT be advertised for beach volleyball.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Wish i had bought these a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: These water socks are amazing. My wife and i bought a pair for a trip to Lake Powell and wore them everyday while jet-skiing, swimming, playing volleyball, beach walking. They fit perfectly and are very comfortable to wear for several hours at a time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: GB Fan in NM

customer_reviews.title: Great for swimming and didn't feel any heat when walking ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for swimming and didn't feel any heat when walking on hot pavement before getting into the water. Great slim fit! Not for rocky terrain, as you feel every jagged rock (it is a water sock). Overall worked great, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am women size 9 shoes with a wide foot. These are a bit tight, but still work. I wear them with ScubaPro fins. I love the neon green.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snug Fit
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for wearing with swim fins. Nice snug fit and well made. Will absolutely not slide off your feet. Constructed of the same material as a wet suit with a tougher sole. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ibenthere

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, functional, and very durable. Excellent design!
customer_reviews.text: These are great booties for the beach, especially if the sand is hot, or gravelly. I use these while metal detecting beaches both in and out of the water. They are comfortable, durable, and save the soles of my feet. They fit well by their sizing, and don't slip. Highly recommended, and I would purchase again if the need arose.
customer_reviews.author: Frank E. TrinkleTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I haven't hit the water yet to try these out for snorkeling and test their durability, but they're comfortable and the customer service is on point. The sizing was a little off, and the XL was too small (I wear a 10.5M shoe). The company promptly sent a larger pair without requiring a return, which fit perfectly, and they were fast to follow up with all my messages. Even if they're not super durable, they're cute and seem like a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jookyg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended these, since the beaches near me have rocks and shells on the bottom. I got them and tried them out for the first time, and these are fantastic. So light and comfortable and durable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Mnatsakanov

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ok for light usage.
customer_reviews.text: When walking around the beach, these keep the hot sand from burning your feet but they did not stand up very well against stones. They tore at the heel on my third day of wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Ajani

customer_reviews.title: Not for use in Chlorinated pool!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after 3 uses in the pool..... Shame. Would probably be ok in natural water. They also leak in standing water so these aren't water tight socks if you're looking for that either.
customer_reviews.author: KatP

customer_reviews.title: Nice neoprene socks
customer_reviews.text: Used these to hike in the narrows in Utah. Kept my feet from getting too cold in the water and was able to tighten around the ankle to prevent pebbles and rocks from getting inside as well.
customer_reviews.author: Y Leho

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Good fit out of the box per size guide. Minimal packaging (yay!) and nice effort from proprietor to let you know they appreciate the order and quick links for assistance. Using them under wading boots to wet wade so for the price point they are an easy experiment that will be reinforced by the exoskeleton of the boot but first impressions are they would be great on a SUP or light boat shoes but these are socks, not water shoe/Sandler substitutes.
customer_reviews.author: Babatundee

customer_reviews.title: Socks ..... NOT ... shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are not “water shoes” They are “water socks” ...... I have an injured toe/nail on one foot and don’t want to stop going to the water to surf . I got these And it gives my toe / nail protection needed when walking in the sand and surf . Works as I need Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Scotty C

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and soft
customer_reviews.text: Just received so I have not used yet. Will update when I do. These appear to be great quality. Very soft, can barely feel they are on. Fit perfectly under my fins. Nice anti-slip bottom. Looking forward to trying them out soon.
customer_reviews.author: p888t

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous! They’re super comfy and a great addition to fins. They really protected my feet. The bumps on the bottom do wear away with excessive use but they’re still very functional
customer_reviews.author: adreaminaqua

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great in these socks. I love the strap around the ankle that is adjustable. We cannot wait to get out to the water as soon as possible in the spring and these worked well over the ankles of my wetsuit. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PBaker

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product: revised
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10.5 shoe and this "sock' was a perfect fit. Adding cushion to my fins.. Revsion: After wearing them 3x a seem opened up on the side about an 1' long.
customer_reviews.author: ProBait

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great for swimming in an area that's mucky or has an undesirable bottom. I use them to make the water fins. I am narrow and it's not easy to keep those suckers on with out these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too thick for fins
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with the intention of wearing them with my fins while snorkeling but they are too thick. They are very nicely constructed, cute, and would be great for walking on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: bcrgrrl

customer_reviews.title: Love the guarantee!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of gloves, way too tight, so I tried to exchange them for a larger size. Surf and Snow's guarantee policy insisted I keep them, they refunded the price AND added $10 for my troubles. I ordered the larger size (perfect) and added some water socks to match. Still need to try them out in real life, but I'm very satisfied (obviously) with the ordering process. Keeping Surf and Snow on my list of vendors to go to first.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, protects me feet, helps flippers stay on
customer_reviews.text: My headline says it all. These work really well and save my feet from rough spots like reef. I was most impressed with how comfortable it is to where flippers now with these.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: love the water socks
customer_reviews.text: Can be worn without or with water shoes. In water shoes the water socks keep the sand away from rubbing on your feet causing sores. Also the water temp doesn't make you feet cold. Can also just wear the socks in pools. I mostly bought them for inside my water shoes so that the sand in the shoes don't cause problems on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Willey

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and feel.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Smart Socks. They fit and feel very comfortable. Haven't tried them in the water yet or know about the durability because we're saving them for snorkeling on our trip to Tahiti in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: MikeeH

customer_reviews.title: didn't last a day
customer_reviews.text: This fell apart after 2 hours of practice. But was able to return it without any issues. Thinking of buying another one, just to see if it was one off.
customer_reviews.author: Arev

customer_reviews.title: Good but grab a spare set just in case
customer_reviews.text: Received in January and by July the glue on one seam is coming undone and there’s a hole in the foot of the other one. I use these 1-3 times a week training with fins at the gym. Do wish they lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: Used these while snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Used these for snorkeling (put them underneath my flippers) they kept my feet comfortable in the flippers, they fit nicely and seem to be an item that will last a while. They are super affordable, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine&sand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wearing with Scuba fins!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for snorkeling and scuba diving. No more being rubbed raw by fans and no more cold feet while diving and snorkeling! I’m very excited about these. The Velcro assures they won’t slide off and they come in so many fun colors.
customer_reviews.author: Donna O.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfectly fitting neoprene socks
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought 2 pairs of BPS storm smart socks for me and my husband to use with our float tube fins. These socks are well made and of great quality. They fit perfectly and are very comfortable. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Martha H. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: All my friends are jealous
customer_reviews.text: I play competitive volleyball all year long & when Spring hits it can get super cold or super hot when living in the Midwest. These sandsox have proved to be durable in all weather.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Ventimiglia

customer_reviews.title: Good experience & perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered the small neoprene socks and just could not get my feet through the opening. Even though I was away and did not get a chance to try them on until the return date had passed, the company (Surf & Snow Warehouse) was kind enough to give me a full refund, so that I could re-order the larger size and I'm happy to report that these fit perfectly. I wear a size 7 narrow show and medium was the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and great materials
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these, having never worn sand socks before I was surprised at how much of a difference these made playing sand volleyball. I wear these every week regardless of the weather and they are always very comfortable. Easy to clean, I throw them in the washer about once every other week.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Mastera

customer_reviews.title: Stitching coming apart
customer_reviews.text: These are 3 months old and I've used them less than 10x, twice in a pool. The stitching is already coming apart. A scuba diver I know has a pair that look really reinforced, I'll have to ask him what brand they are, because these arent going to last
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Holes in Sole Quickly Developed
customer_reviews.text: I used these to play sand volleyball on just 3 different occasions, and then discovered they had developed holes on the bottom of the sole. Very disappointed they deteriorated so quickly Updated: added a star for the prompt refund given by the seller and customer service
customer_reviews.author: Wes S

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: These lasted my husband about 2 wears - just for snorkeling on the beach, very light walking on super soft sand. They have split open at the seam around the entire sock. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sup
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, true to size. I use for SUP on colder days. Just enough thickness for warmth but thin enough to maintain board feel.
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Received these a couple of weeks ago. We'll be going on vacation and I wanted something to protect my feet. I wear a size 15 so I was concerned. But they fit perfectly and are so comfortable!! Can't wait to hit the surf and sand!!
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a beach flag football tournament!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 10 year old son that had a flag football tournament on the beach. He wanted to go barefoot until he tried them on. He loved them! He said they were comfortable, they stayed on and they held up beautifully to the wear and tear of the 5 games he played. Looked just a good as when they came out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Was a little slippery when getting onto the boat. All in all, very comfortable and the fur was perfect. The size is true to the recommended size selection.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and effective temperature control
customer_reviews.text: They fit my husband perfectly and have served to keep his feet warm as we're playing in a sand league right now while it's in the 30's outside!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Adams

customer_reviews.title: Prefect Fit, Prefect for the Lake
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed something to wear on his feet to protect them while riding his knee board at the lake...he loves them...they are prefect.
customer_reviews.author: Joy C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.  Worked as described.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. They’re not waterproof. They work like a wetsuit. But they do keep the feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: RJPStockton

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I used this to get into a plain and don't have to worry about taking shoes off when boarding the plain, and they were perfect to travel and feel my feet so relax during the 10 hours fly
customer_reviews.author: Leon Venegas

customer_reviews.title: “Must have” for long walks on beach!
customer_reviews.text: I liked these so much I bought a pair for my skeptical wife. She finally decided to try them and eventually said “where have these been all my life”. She won’t go on the beach without them.
customer_reviews.author: All Hail Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of water hiking shoes that rub my heal raw. I use them in BWCA in Minnesota. The BPS Storm kept that from happening. They were so nice and comfortable. I used them for 5 hours a day for 5 days straight. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not a good option for foot protection
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely disappointed in these. I purchased them to wear on vacation to Florida. I wore them one time and when I got home they had holes in the soles and sides. As a diabetic I thought this would be a more comfortable alternative to water shoes. However, as they did not stand up to a day at the beach they offered absolutely zero protection by wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually leave any reviews, but these really work great, I got them for my daughters soccer tournament at the beach and she Loved them, no sand went in to them and she didn't have to be pulling them up like the rest of her team who got those slip on ones, the band around this ones really do the job. loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They keep your feet warm!
customer_reviews.text: These keep your feet warm! I have had no problems with them and I've been using them for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opening too small
customer_reviews.text: Can’t rate comfort, durability or value for the money,?got this for my 9 year old grandson size xs, and he couldn’t even get the front part of his foot into it, cute but had to return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Great idea just needs better quality control and craftsmanship. My first order had 2 lefts and they replaced it but after a handful of times being used the seems tore popped
customer_reviews.author: Katie C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with swim fins
customer_reviews.text: These water socks fit very well and are very comfortable. I used them a lot with swim fins for snorkeling and I am very happy that I bought this product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mott

customer_reviews.title: Warm feet !
customer_reviews.text: I am a petite woman and was happy to have found these socks. They fit my size 5 feet and kept them warm and dry under my hiking boots during my trek through the Zion Narrows in October. I saw many people on the trail renting them for not much less than these cost. Terrific buy!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Definitely going to buy again
customer_reviews.text: Showed up on time. Packaged well. Just went out snorkling and free diving earlier today and used them. They work amazing. Super snug and comfortable fit. They grip VERY well and protect your feet when you walk outside of the water. I walked a trail through the woods and couldn’t even feel the rocks or sticks beneath my feet. Price is a little steep for what they are but I’m not complaining. 100% satisfies to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan shane Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Make our swim day much easier and fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought them for the rock lake. The kids loved them and it made it easy to walk and swim.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Not of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, torn at seam after 2nd beach use. Not comfortable at all. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony F.

product_meta.title: BPS 'Storm Sock' Ultra Premium Water Fin Sock (Low Cut - Unisex) 3mm Neoprene Glued and Blind Stitched w/Fit Adjustment Straps for Snorkeling, Tide-Pooling and All Water and Sand Activities…
feature_bullets: Different to other Water Fin Socks - BPS’s ‘Storm Socks’ are cleverly designed to always feel like they will stay on, and let much less water in around the ankle. A unisex fit with a MORE DURABLE (but still FLEXIBLE) sole helps everyone enjoy their sports like sand volleyball and beach soccer. Please check the size chart to ensure a great fit.

How do they do it? An extra adjustable elastic strap around the ankle ensures an excellent fit and minimises any water getting in; a flexible but tougher than standard sole with a rubber grip pattern handles slippery environments, and a tab at the top rear of the sock makes getting them on and off easier than other socks.

The fully flexible soles provide an amazing ‘foot feel’ on the beach, surfing or on a SUP. You genuinely forget you are wearing them. But for this to happen the sole is not rigid enough to handle walking on asphalt or concrete for very long; so to keep your socks feeling comfortable, put them on once at the beach or river or boat. Also, you will receive e-guide providing some helpful tips on getting the most out of your Neoprene Fin Socks. Make sure you DON'T OPT-OUT so you won't miss this

Please buy with complete confidence, all our products are stored and shipped quickly and reliably to you by Amazon. And all BPS products come with a 'Next-Level' guarantee for 12 months; if you encounter any quality (or even fit issues) at all, just let us know and your item will be replaced or you'll be refunded - your choice!

Thank you for looking at a product from our store, Surf and Snow Warehouse. We are a small family business that ONLY sells what we know and love - water sports gear. We know our products, use our products, and stand behind them 100%. We are known for the great product support, advice and after-sales service we provide -- so if you have ANY questions about any of our products, please just ask.
